text:
@toryboypierce @COVID19 @MattHancock It was a ‘target’! It does not become a lie if the Govt & NHS fail to meet it!

If you feel the need for ‘heads to roll’ then perhaps you need to sack all the suppliers, NHS staff & the army, etc? 
I‘m  sure they're ALL doing their best! 
What do you think you will achieve by it?
